Running Wild Race 2019

Jun 22, 2019

7:15 am

  • Location: Denver, Colorado, USA
  • Venue: Regis University
    Google Maps

Join the 5K or 1-Mile Fun Run to help prevent the extinction of endangered African wildlife in Denver on June 22, 2019!

Register for Running Wild

Race Pricing:

5K Race:
Early Registration (Ends May 11): $35.00
Standard Registration (May 12 – June 18 @ 11:59 p.m.) : $40.00
Race Day Registration (on race day): $45.00

1-Mile Fun Run (13 & Above):
Early Registration (Ends May 11): $25.00
Standard Registration (May 12 – June 18 @ 11:59 p.m.) : $30.00
Race Day Registration (on race day): $35.00

1-Mile Fun Run (12 & Under):
Registration: $20.00 (No price increases)

5K Team Registration
Registration (Ends June 18 @ 11:59 p.m.): $30 per person
Must register 4 or more in one transaction

1-Mile Fun Run Team Registration
Registration (Ends June 18 @ 11:59 p.m.): $15 per person
Must register 4 or more in one transaction

Run Wild in Your Dreams
Registration is $35.00. This option is for those who want to sleep in on race day, or support us from a distance. You will receive a souvenir t-shirt.

To guarantee shirt sizes, please register before May 31, 2019.

Online Registration ends at ends at 11:59 p.m. on June 18, 2019.

Support CCF

CCF USA is a registered non-profit 501(c) 3. Donations are fully tax-deductible in the United States if given to a CCF USA office and/or deposited to a U.S. bank.
